scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production yarn run webpack && sam build
scripts.build-local: NODE_ENV=development yarn run webpack && sam build
scripts.dynamodb: (sleep 3; aws dynamodb create-table --cli-input-json file://template-local-db.json --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000 --output text) & docker run -p 8000:8000 amazon/dynamodb-local
scripts.start: yarn run build-local && sam local start-api --port=4000 --skip-pull-image --profile=default
scripts.start-debug: yarn run build-local && sam local start-api --port=4000 -d 9999 --skip-pull-image --profile=default
